pr_title: DEV-1163 Make CMEK a required argument

timeline.message:
DEV-1163 Make CMEK a required argument

Better to require every invocation to have a key (even if it is just a
development one) than risk not having one on a run that requires it.

timeline.bodyText: better to pull these up into CommonArguments than to introduce a dependency on pipeline Arguments
timeline.author: pauldwolfe

timeline.bodyText: Normal the CMEK is actually just the name of the key used ie. projects/project/location/blah/blah. Does this actually work having it a json file? I don't see why running in Docker would need to impact CMEK (it's more like the prokect or location setttings).
timeline.author: pauldwolfe
pauldwolfe

replies.bodyText: Ah. I moved the builder method below the constants and interface methods.
replies.author: nedleitch

timeline.author: pauldwolfe

timeline.bodyText: As you pointed out this doesn't make it very external friendly. But... I don't think that's the most important thing right now so we can decide later whether its worth the additional complexity of having a separate flag to disable cmek and make this an optional again.
timeline.author: pauldwolfe

timeline.message: DEV-1163 Move default region to CommonArguments
